name: Witch!
description:
A fun 2D platformer quest game. You are a witch with your own village to look after, and sick villagers to heal. 

Leave your home village and embark upon a quest in the forest to collect food and medicines and defeat the dragon that's been carrying off your villagers! Then return to heal your villagers and discover the next adventure that awaits...

Meet and learn to deal with scuttlebugs, fireflies and a dragon. Search under log piles for keys to open new areas of the forest. Chill out in the village, hatching chicks from eggs.

But mind out.. your choices all have consequences!

This is a demo game, with one fully playable level. The  game is still in development and there are more levels to come.. If you like it and want more, let me know! :)

PC build
